lead: Robotics is evolving rapidly with advancements in AI and digital twin technologies, significantly impacting industries and driving innovation in Europe.

stories.title: Nvidia and Dassault Systèmes combine digital twins and AI in industry world models
stories.summary: Nvidia and Dassault Systèmes are collaborating to integrate AI with digital twin technology, creating a shared architecture for industrial applications. This partnership aims to enhance manufacturing processes by leveraging real-world AI and physics-validated models. The initiative is expected to transform how industries design and operate factories, making them more efficient and cost-effective.

stories.title: Kembara closes €750M first close to fuel growth of European deep tech startups
stories.summary: The Kembara Fund I has successfully closed its first fundraising round at €750 million, aiming to support European deep tech startups, including those in robotics. With a target of €1 billion, the fund is backed by significant investments from the European Investment Fund. This initiative highlights the growing emphasis on fostering innovation in advanced technologies across Europe.

stories.title: Robotics will break AI infrastructure: Here's what comes next
stories.summary: As robotics technology continues to advance, experts predict it will challenge existing AI infrastructure. The integration of robotics with AI is expected to lead to significant changes in how data is processed and utilized. This evolution poses both opportunities and challenges for industries relying on AI, necessitating a reevaluation of current systems to accommodate these innovations.
